title: FADA seeks legislative safeguards to prevent OEMs exiting abruptly
description: The Federation of Automobile Dealers Associations (FADA) has called for legislative measures to prevent abrupt exits by automotive companies, which have led to job losses. FADA also seeks government support for the full implementation of the Central Motor Vehicles Rules and reclassification of auto dealer workshops to environmentally sustainable zones.
